data.title: Victor Hugo
data.meta_description: He was born on February 26, 1802 in Besançon, in France. He died in 1885. He was a famous writer and poet of the Romantic movement. His best-known works are Les misérables in 1862 and Notre-Dame de Paris (The Hunchback of Notre-Dame) in 1831. He is buried in the Panthéon, in Paris.
data.text: He was born on February 26, 1802 in Besançon, in France. He died in 1885. He was a famous writer and poet of the Romantic movement. His best-known works are Les misérables in 1862 and Notre-Dame de Paris (The Hunchback of Notre-Dame) in 1831. He is buried in the Panthéon, in Paris.[Read more about this person]
